altTitles.ja: 名探偵・金田一耕助シリーズ

description.en:
An incident occurred in which 10 employees at the jewelry store Tengindo were poisoned and their jewelry stolen. Eisuke Tsubaki, a former viscount, was interrogated on that charge and disappeared after being released... After that, a series of gruesome murders occur at the Tsubaki family accompanied by the sound of a flute...Is the flute-playing monster really the real Viscount Tsubaki? What is the "Devil's Crest" that the people of the Tsubaki family fear? The famous detective Kosuke Kindaichi solves the mystery of a terrifying and sad case! JET has adapted Seishi Yokomizo's masterpiece mystery novel into a manga. Contains the title work and ``Mehiru''.

A beautiful married woman disappears, leaving behind a strange greeting card that hints at a tragic death. Then, a young man and a married woman are found naked, piled on top of each other... Is this the result of an extramarital affair? The woman's husband, Kingo Kazama, is a businessman who made his fortune through underground activities. Before long, bizarre incidents occur one after another around him. The famous detective Kosuke Kindaichi takes on the mysteries of the "Rain Man" who appears like a ghost and the disappearance of corpses! JET has adapted Seishi Yokomizo's masterpiece mystery into a manga. Contains the title work and ``Devil of the Flower Garden.''

Gyobu Island floating in the Seto Inland Sea. The man who was staying there disappeared. Kosuke Kindaichi, a famous detective who has been asked to look for a man, is informed of the mysterious death of a man by Inspector Isokawa. Furthermore, the man left behind ominous words. "That island is haunted by evil spirits, be careful at night when the nue cries.''... Set on a cursed isolated island in the ocean, nicknamed ``Evil Island,'' a gruesome series of murders has already begun! JET has adapted Seishi Yokomizo's masterpiece mystery into a manga. Contains the title work and "Raven".
